short_summary: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for controlling anode corrosion in the indicated part(s) including, but not limited to, anode, corrosion preventive:
description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below. The delivery is requested at CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia and CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia.Item 1, GSIN: N5340, NSN: 01-2990135, ANODE, CORROSION PREVENTIVEPart No.: W-116-H, NCAGE: 59358, INSTITUTE OF MANAGEMENT INSTRUCTIONORPart No.: W-116-H, NCAGE: K5203, CORRPRO COMPANIES EUROPEQuantity: 40, Unit of Issue: EA, to be delivered to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia.Item 2, GSIN: N5340, NSN: 01-2990135, ANODE, CORROSION PREVENTIVEPart No.: W-116-H, NCAGE: 59358, INSTITUTE OF MANAGEMENT INSTRUCTIONORPart No.: W-116-H, NCAGE: K5203, CORRPRO COMPANIES EUROPEQuantity: 20, Unit of Issue: EA, to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia.Item 3, GSIN: N5340, NSN: 21-0013732, ANODE, CORROSION PREVENTIVEPart No.: 5340STD137PC1TYPEAANDPC2ANDPC3, NCAGE: 36219, DEPARTMENT OF NATIONAL DEFENCEQuantity: 600, Unit of Issue: EA, to be delivered to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia.Item 4, GSIN: N5340, NSN: 21-0013732, ANODE, CORROSION PREVENTIVEPart No.: 5340STD137PC1TYPEAANDPC2ANDPC3, NCAGE: 36219, DEPARTMENT OF NATIONAL DEFENCEQuantity: 600, Unit of Issue: EA, to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia.Bidders proposing an Equivalent or a Substitute Product must indicate the brand name and model and/or Part Number and the NCAGE they are offering.Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars. Bids submitted in foreign currency will be rejected.The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
full_summary:
===============

**Anode Corrosion Preventive Tender RFP**

**Tender Details**

*   **Tender Reference Number**: PW-22-01016597
*   **Solicitation Number**: W8482-230516/A
*   **Publication Date**: December 12th, 2022
*   **Tender Closing Date**: January 13th, 2023, at 2:00 PM
*   **Contracting Entity**: Department of National Defence
*   **End User Entity**: Department of National Defence
*   **Contact Information**: Ashley Nadeau-Weeks, ASHLEY.NADEAU-WEEKS@forces.gc.ca, (613) 601-8013

**Tender Description**

The Department of National Defence is soliciting bids for the supply and delivery of anode corrosion preventives for various items. The delivery locations are CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia, and CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia.

**Specification and Quantity**

Item 1: 40 units of anode corrosion preventives (part no. W-116-H, NCAGE: 59358 or K5203) to be delivered to CFB Halifax.
Item 2: 20 units of anode corrosion preventives (part no. W-116-H, NCAGE: 59358 or K5203) to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt.
Items 3 and 4: 600 units of anode corrosion preventives (part no. 5340STD137PC1TYPEAANDPC2ANDPC3, NCAGE: 36219) to be delivered to CFB Halifax and Esquimalt, respectively.

**Submission Requirements**

*   Prices must be submitted in Canadian dollars.
*   Bidders are allowed to submit equivalent or substitute products with supporting documentation.
*   Documents may be submitted in either English or French.

**Additional Information**

*   The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
*   Trade agreements include the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and others.

**Attachments**

Download the RFP document in English:
[link to document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/12/a826114f3b6bb19d72023f23d484091c/w8482-230516_-_english_rfp_clauses.pdf)

Download the RFP document
